dependencies.description:
The NVIDIA HPC SDK is a comprehensive suite of compilers, libraries and
tools essential to maximizing developer productivity and the performance
and portability of HPC applications. The NVIDIA HPC SDK C, C++, and
Fortran compilers support GPU acceleration of HPC modeling and
simulation applications with standard C++ and Fortran, OpenACC
directives, and CUDA. GPU-accelerated math libraries maximize
performance on common HPC algorithms, and optimized communications
libraries enable standards-based multi-GPU and scalable systems
programming. Performance profiling and debugging tools simplify porting
and optimization of HPC applications.
dependencies.name: c

dependencies.description:
GEOS (Geometry Engine, Open Source). GEOS is a C/C++ library for
computational geometry with a focus on algorithms used in geographic
information systems (GIS) software. It implements the OGC Simple
Features geometry model and provides all the spatial functions in that
standard as well as many others. GEOS is a core dependency of PostGIS,
QGIS, GDAL, and Shapely.
dependencies.name: geos

dependencies.description: The Cython compiler for writing C extensions for the Python language.
dependencies.name: py-cython

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Wavelet and simulated Annealing SliP inversion (WASP). This code uses a
nonlinear simulated annealing inversion method to model slip amplitude,
rake, rupture time, and rise time on a discretized fault plane, finding
the solution that best fits the observations in the wavelet domain.
dependent_to.name: neic-finitefault

dependent_to.description: Fix shapes that cross the antimeridian.
dependent_to.name: py-antimeridian

dependent_to.description: Cartopy - a cartographic python library with matplotlib support.
dependent_to.name: py-cartopy

dependent_to.description: An analysis environment for satellite and other earth observation data.
dependent_to.name: py-datacube

dependent_to.description:
GeoPandas is an open source project to make working with geospatial data
in python easier. GeoPandas extends the datatypes used by pandas to
allow spatial operations on geometric types. Geometric operations are
performed by shapely. Geopandas further depends on fiona for file access
and descartes and matplotlib for plotting.
dependent_to.name: py-geopandas

dependent_to.description:
A Python library designed to make data analysis and visualization
seamless and simple.
dependent_to.name: py-geoviews

dependent_to.description:
A library for image augmentation in machine learning experiments,
particularly convolutional neural networks. Supports the augmentation of
images, keypoints/landmarks, bounding boxes, heatmaps and segmentation
maps in a variety of different ways.
dependent_to.name: py-imgaug

dependent_to.description:
Collection of tools for reading, visualizing and performing calculations
with weather data.
dependent_to.name: py-metpy

dependent_to.description: Python Cortical mapping software for fMRI data.
dependent_to.name: py-pycortex

dependent_to.description: A Python client for Radiant MLHub.
dependent_to.name: py-radiant-mlhub

dependent_to.description:
rasterstats is a Python module for summarizing geospatial raster
datasets based on vector geometries. It includes functions for zonal
statistics and interpolated point queries. The command-line interface
allows for easy interperability with other GeoJSON tools.
dependent_to.name: py-rasterstats

dependent_to.description: Create masks of geospatial regions for arbitrary grids
dependent_to.name: py-regionmask

dependent_to.description: An Astropy coordinated package for region handling
dependent_to.name: py-regions

dependent_to.description:
TorchGeo: datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models for
geospatial data.
dependent_to.name: py-torchgeo

dependent_to.description: Import, export, process, analyze and view triangular meshes
dependent_to.name: py-trimesh

dependent_to.description:
Xarray extension for unstructured climate and global weather data
analysis and visualization
dependent_to.name: py-uxarray

description: Manipulation and analysis of geometric objects in the Cartesian plane.
name: py-shapely
